00002 #define TYPES_H
00003 
00004 #ifndef WIN32
00005 #include <stddef.h>
00006 #include <sys/types.h>
00007 #include <stdint.h>

00009 #include <sys/types.h>
00010 #include <wchar.h>
00011 typedef signed char             int8_t;
00012 typedef short                   int16_t;
00013 typedef long                            int32_t;
00014 typedef __int64                         int64_t;
00015 typedef unsigned char           uint8_t;
00016 typedef unsigned short  uint16_t;
00017 typedef unsigned long           uint32_t;
00018 typedef unsigned __int64        uint64_t;

00020 #endif //end of WIN32
